mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T1_PRODUCT_UPDATE (PRODUCT_MODEL, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_KNAME, PRODUCT_SIZE, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_UPDATE, USER_ID, SELLBUY, PRODUCT_COLOR, PRODUCT_LAUNCH_PRICE, PRODUCT_CATEGORIE1, PRODUCT_CATEGORIE2,PRODUCT_BRAND) VALUES (#{pModel}, #{pName}, #{kName}, #{pSize}, #{pPrice}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{uId}, #{sellBuy}, #{pColor}, #{launch}, #{pCategorie1}, #{pCategorie2}, #{brand})
INSERT INTO T1_PRODUCT_IMG(PRODUCT_NAME, P_IMG_PATH, P_IMG_NAME) VALUES (#{pName}, #{pImgPath}, #{pImgName})
mapper.select: SELECT U.PRODUCT_NAME, I.P_IMG_PATH, I.P_IMG_NAME FROM T1_PRODUCT_UPDATE U INNER JOIN T1_PRODUCT_IMG AS I ON U.PRODUCT_NAME = I.PRODUCT_NAME WHERE I.PRODUCT_NAME = #{pName} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM T1_PRODUCT_UPDATE U INNER JOIN T1_PRODUCT_BRAND B ON U.PRODUCT_BRAND = B.PRODUCT_BRAND WHERE U.PRODUCT_SELL_NUMBER = #{proNum}
SELECT MIN(PRODUCT_PRICE) AS SELLMINPRICE FROM T1_PRODUCT_UPDATE WHERE PRODUCT_MODEL = #{modelNum} AND SELLBUY = 'B'
SELECT MIN(PRODUCT_PRICE) AS BUYMINPRICE FROM T1_PRODUCT_UPDATE WHERE PRODUCT_MODEL = #{modelNum} AND SELLBUY = 'S'

SELECT * FROM T1_TRANSACTION T INNER JOIN(
SELECT MAX(TRANSACTION_DATE) AS MAXDATE FROM T1_TRANSACTION T INNER JOIN T1_PRODUCT_UPDATE P ON T.PRODUCT_SELL_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_SELL_NUMBER WHERE P.PRODUCT_MODEL = #{modelNum} ) A ON T.TRANSACTION_DATE = A.MAXDATE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T1_PRODUCT_LIKE WHERE USER_ID = #{uId} AND PRODUCT_MODEL = #{proNum}
